Screen - Class in com.github.arham4.turtle
The Screen to display all entities on.

setup(int, int) - Method in class com.github.arham4.turtle.Screen
Sets up the Graphical User Interface to make a canvas in which entities are displayed.

Sets up the Graphical User Interface to make a canvas in which entities are displayed.
shape(String) - Method in class com.github.arham4.turtle.Turtle
Changes the shape of the turtle by looking at the location specified (starting from the project root).
shape(TurtleShape) - Method in class com.github.arham4.turtle.Turtle
Sets the shape of the turtle using the appropriate TurtleShape constant.
shape(BufferedImage) - Method in class com.github.arham4.turtle.Turtle
Due to the power of the ImageIO class, this helper method is made so one can load a BufferedImage for the turtle to embody as its shape through custom methods.
SHAPE_FOR_NAME - Static variable in enum com.github.arham4.turtle.utils.TurtleShape
Each name of the TurtleShapes paired with their respective BufferedImage.
speed(double) - Method in class com.github.arham4.turtle.Turtle
Sets the speed value to a new speed.
